item.title: 基于Docker-compose搭建jenkins
item.description: docker-compose配置 version: '2' services: jenkins: image: jenkins/jenkins:latest restart: always environment: JAVA_OPTS: "-Dorg.apache.commons.jelly.tags.fmt.timeZone=Asia/Shanghai -Djava.awt.headless=true -Dmail.smtp.starttls.enable=true" ports: - "80:8080" - "50000:50000" volumes: - '/ssd/jenkins:/var/jenkins_home' - '/var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock' - '/etc/localtime:/etc/localtime:ro' dns: 223.5.5.5 networks: - extnetwork networks: extnetwork: ipam: config: - subnet: 172.255.0.0/16 启动服务 docker-compose up -d
